name: k8s-nodejs-search-algorithms
description: This repository demonstrates the implementation of various search algorithms using NodeJS, deployed on Kubernetes (k8s) with pods, load balancing, resource limits, and more.
author: jrodriguezdiazz <jrodriguezdiazz@outlook.com>

scripts.deploy: kubectl apply -f pod-config.yaml && kubectl apply -f service-config.yaml
scripts.cleanup: kubectl delete -f pod-config.yaml && kubectl delete -f service-config.yaml
